column4: hey all...upgraded to Gutsy and when I load up Compiz-Fusion, I see these errors:  /usr/bin/compiz.real (core) - Error: Couldn't load plugin 'core'
/usr/bin/compiz.real (core) - Error: Couldn't load plugin '3d'  am I missing a package or something????
go to synaptic  scroll to compiz - fusion  and youll see loads of plugins
